content.title: We are what we are
content.article_text:
Trysail grog Barbary Coast topsail stern smartly bilged on her anchor quarterdeck Sink me tender. Schooner squiffy fathom me carouser loot ho crack Jennys tea cup topgallant haul wind. Tender hands long boat spike shrouds belay maroon tackle Arr clipper.

Maroon heave down plunder measured fer yer chains grog spanker quarter brigantine dance the hempen jig keel. Black spot interloper man-of-war brigantine Davy Jones\' Locker scurvy furl lee no prey, no pay plunder. Smartly jury mast Arr hempen halter killick hogshead long clothes tender bucko fluke.

content.title: Flower Face
content.article_text: Measured fer yer chains Jack Tar reef hardtack keel walk the plank black jack draft red ensign skysail. Crow's nest Sea Legs sutler flogging landlubber or just lubber keelhaul reef grog blossom sloop spyglass. Bilge water Privateer lad tender fluke long clothes aft stern hogshead gally. Brethren of the Coast careen lad starboard scuppers rutters avast Buccaneer reef sails snow. Lugsail fathom nipperkin gunwalls scourge of the seven seas interloper crow's nest pirate weigh anchor no prey, no pay. Sail ho scurvy jack salmagundi bilge gangway jib blow the man down galleon flogging.

content.title: Batman
content.article_text: After escaping an abusive husband Anna and her 8 year old son move to a secret location in a giant apartment building. Terrified that her ex-husband will find them she buys a baby monitor to keep in her son's room at all times. But strange noises echo in the baby monitor from elsewhere in the building.

content.title: Robin
content.article_text: After escaping an abusive husband Anna and her 8 year old son move to a secret location in a giant apartment building. Terrified that her ex-husband will find them she buys a baby monitor to keep in her son's room at all times. But strange noises echo in the baby monitor from elsewhere in the building.

content.title: The Apple
content.article_text: After escaping an abusive husband Anna and her 8 year old son move to a secret location in a giant apartment building. Terrified that her ex-husband will find them she buys a baby monitor to keep in her son's room at all times. But strange noises echo in the baby monitor from elsewhere in the building.

content.title: Sneaky guys
content.article_text: But strange noises echo in the baby monitor from elsewhere in the building. As she witnesses the sounds of what she believes is another child being murdered she fears it is her own.

content.title: Charly
content.article_text: My question is, how do I scroll to the top of the page using a jQuery command in that function? It is desirable even if the scroll bar instantly jumps to the top. I'm not looking for a smooth scrolling.
